text: calculate number applications Afghanistan awaiting decision, latest quarter:
code: library(asylum) library(dplyr) #> Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 4.2.3 #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  asylum::awaiting_decision |>    filter(Nationality == "Afghanistan" & Date == max(Date)) |>    summarise(`Total applications awaiting a decision` = sum(Applications)) #> # A tibble: 1 × 1 #>   `Total applications awaiting a decision` #>                                      <dbl> #> 1                                    14406

title: Cases considered under inadmissibility rules — inadmissibility_cases_considered
text: Notes: 1. Data inadmissibility taken internal Home Office management information considered provisional. 2. figures table include small number cases entered system 1 January 2021, strengthened inadmissibility rules came force. 3. Includes main applicants dependants. 4. time period relates action taken (e.g. date notice issued, date inadmissibility decision served, etc). 5. data count outcomes, count individuals; individuals counted multiple times data. example, individual received notice intent decision inadmissibility counted 'notice intent issued' group counted 'inadmissibility decision served' group. 6. Data October December 2022 available time data extraction release, due ongoing work immigration data transitions new case working system. Updated data included future edition Immigration System Statistics release. 7. 'Removals' includes enforced removals entering inadmissibility process. enforced removal linked criminality, excluded removal grounds inadmissibility. However, may still small number enforced removals included figures reasons inadmissibility. 8. Voluntary returns attract inadmissible decision require applicant withdraw asylum claim. , voluntary returns excluded result inadmissibility decision. total number asylum-related returns asylum seekers (beyond inadmissibility process), see Returns summary table Ret_05.
